===Noun===
{{ja-noun|けっかい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=けっかい|Buddhism}} [[restricted]] [[access]]:
## restricted [[access]] to a specific area for purposes of Buddhist [[training]]
## in [[esoteric]] Buddhism, restricted access to a specific area of a [[dōjō]] for purposes of [[purification]]
## a wooden [[fence]] or [[partition]] separating the inner and outer [[sanctuary|sanctuaries]] of a [[temple]], or separating [[monastic]] and public seating in the outer sanctuary
## an area into which anything potentially disruptive to Buddhist training is restricted from entering, such as a {{m|ja|女人結界|tr=nyonin kekkai||no-women zone}}
# a [[lattice]] or [[screen]] demarcating a merchant's or shopkeeper's [[register]] and [[bookkeeping]] area
# {{lb|ja|sort=けっかい|tea}} an item used in {{m|ja|茶道|tr=sadō||[[tea ceremony]]}} to visually separate the guest [[tatami]] area from the ceremony tatami area
# {{lb|ja|sort=けっかい|manga|anime}} on a small [[scale]], meaning a [[project]]ed [[energy]] [[barrier]], [[force field]], or [[shield]]; and on a larger scale, meaning a [[w:Pocket universe|pocket universe]], [[spiritual]] or otherwise
